recipesJson.name: EIGHT
recipesJson.author: JoeRoots
recipesJson.description:
Inw pineapple & lemon sicily = Pineapple 
Caramel candy, bavarian cream & super sweet  = caramel 
Vanilla custard = Custard 

= Pineapple Caramel Custard 

This is attempt nr. Eight

reviews.text: This was actually incredibly tasty! The 30 ml I made barely lasted a few days. Will definitely mix a bigger bottle and let it steep a while. Great recipe.
